name: QUARTIQ GmbH
goal: QUARTIQ supplies software and hardware control infrastructure for complex systems in quantum communication, simulation, computation and quantum optics. Together with research and industry partners we develop new algorithms and distributed high-performance electronics for measurement and control tasks in scalable quantum technologies.
interests: Communication, Digital economy and society, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: We are actively participating in multiple projects that are part of and related to the European Quantum Technology Flagship project and want to influence and the decision-making process in the area of fundamental research funding, strategy and policy.
